data.description: Join Nokia Bell Labs' Math and Algorithms Group within the AI Research Lab and contribute to pioneering research in communications theory, optimization, machine learning, and the theory of computing. In this role, you'll conduct high-impact research and apply your findings to real-world challenges across Nokia's technologies. Focus areas may include improving LLM performance on enterprise databases, using ML to interpret complex network data, developing agentic methods for multi-database interaction, and managing dynamic data streams. This is an exceptional opportunity to advance both theoretical and applied research in AI and data science.
